data.title: Obituary for Charlie L. "Joe" Banks
data.meta_description: Charlie Banks | Passed away on Jun 06, 2021 | Charlie “Joe” Banks Jr., age 52 of Emily...
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Charlie L. "Joe" Banks | Koop Funeral Home
data.text:
Charlie “Joe” Banks Jr., age 52 of Emily died on June 6, 2021 at Essentia St. Mary’s Medical Center in Duluth. He was born in Minneapolis on April 26, 1969 to Charlie and Helen (Bodle) Banks Sr.

Joe married Diana Tscheu on July 29, 2006 in Emily. Joe’s previous employment include the Aitkin Public Schools; Trus Joist Weyerhaeuser, Thrivent, and Mann Lake Ltd. He was an Officer for the cities of Deerwood and Cuyuna. Joe served as the Chairman of Ross Lake Township Board, Ross Lake First Responder; IMLPOA Board member and was an American Red Cross Disaster Volunteer.

Joe is survived by his wife Diana; son, Noah Banks of Emily; daughter, Jodi Banks of Emily; and one sister, Charlene Thompson of Champlin.

Preceding Joe in death are his parents.

Funeral services will be held at 1:00 p.m. Thursday, June 17, 2021 at the Emily Wesleyan Church in Emily. Burial will be at the Pine Ridge Cemetery in Emily. A visitation will be held on Wednesday at the Koop Funeral Home in Crosby from 4:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. and on Thursday one hour prior the service at the church.
